explains: n. 看法，观点；争论，争吵；争夺，竞争
wordGroup: bone of contention 争论的焦点；争端的原因
resource contention 资源冲突；资源竞争

sentences.en: One area of contention is the availability of nursery care.
sentences.cn: 争论的一个方面是提供幼儿保育的可能性。

sentences.en: His case has become a source of contention between civil liberties activists and the government.
sentences.cn: 他的案子已变成了公民自由活动家们和政府之间的争论缘由。

sentences.en: This is an extreme example again, but it shows that the scheduling overhead of contention is not trivial.
sentences.cn: 这又是一个极端的示例，但它表明争论的调度开销并不是微不足道的。
